Our number one biggest snub of the 2015 Oscars: The Lego Movie!
The fan favorite was not only expected to get nominated...
...but was actually a front-runner to win on many people's Oscar ballot this year.
Instead, the Academy decided to nominate two lesser-known films:...
Song of the Sea from Belgium and The Tale of Princess Kaguya from Japan.
At least The Lego Movie was somewhat vindicated last night...
...taking home the Critics' Choice Movie Award for Best Animated Film.
